name: Lunapark VR
description:
Take a wild ride in an abandoned (or is it?) amusement park! Hop into the cart to take a night ride among crazy skeletons, get bats tangled in your hair, and hold on tight, 'coz we hope you're not afraid of spiders!

Lunapark Coaster will take you for a joyous ride that will give you chills and thrills with every turn! It's not for a fainthearted, as Lunapark Coaster will make your head spin and your heart drop! Admire the detailed environment, crazy creatures, complementary sound effects, and get immersed in this crazy ride!
